name: Froggo Bongo
description:
A small game about a frog that jumps through the swamp using bongos.

This game was developed for the 2022 Tiger Dev Input Hardware Jam. This game was designed to utilize the Gamecube Donkey Kong Bongos as an input device. This game also supports arrow keys for input

All code and art was created by myself. Background music was used with permission from Kevin Macleod. Sound effects were found from various users from freesound.org

"Whimsy Groove" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
